item.title: Help with home teleport animation please {718}
item.dc:creator: @loliateyourcat loliateyourcat
item.description:
@loliateyourcat wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:553770”]Can you provide more information and whatever code you modified?
I have no idea what revision you’re using, what base, anything. I can only assume it’s 718+ because you keep saying how you “work on 718+” in every thread possible.

How much have you looked into this before coming for help? Have you found which method controls the teleporting? Or, which method controls what style of teleport? So on.

We need literally every bit of information on your issue that you can give us. Especially code.[/quote]

Sorry mate, I was very tired when I wrote this lol.
I have updated it

Read full topic

item.title: Help with home teleport animation please {718}
item.dc:creator: @loliateyourcat loliateyourcat
item.description:
@loliateyourcat wrote:

Ok, I have figured out what I wanted, but I am still in a bit of a pickle.

Could someone please explain how I can add a delay to the first animation so that it shows?

I have the last animation working, but I need to add a delay to the first. Any and all help will be very much appreciated. Thanks.

Here is what I have written so far.

case "dung": Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(3455,3737, 0)); player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(17108)); player.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(3224)); player.setNextGraphics(new Graphics(3225)); return true;

Read full topic
item.source: Help with home teleport animation please {718}
